source: TEXT_SUBWIL065_00308_SEQ_00<tab>Zezeda is desperately seeking someone to recover stolen coffers of gemstones.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL065_00308_SEQ_00<tab>ブラックブラッシュ停留所のゼゼダは、キキルンに盗まれてしまった積み荷の「アマジナ印の木箱」を取り返してほしいらしい。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL065_00308_SEQ_01<tab>Zezeda tells you that Qiqirn thieves have made off with coffers of precious gemstones. Fearing her overseer's wrath should he find out, Zezeda has turned to you for help. Go to the Qiqirn encampment and recover the three coffers that were taken.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL065_00308_SEQ_01<tab>光り物が好きなキキルン盗賊が、列車の積み荷である鉱石を盗んでしまったらしい。キキルンのアジトである「ネズミの巣」から、「アマジナ印の木箱」を3個回収しよう。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL065_00308_SEQ_02<tab>You have recovered all the stolen coffers. Deliver them to Zezeda at Black Brush Station.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL065_00308_SEQ_02<tab>ネズミの巣から、「アマジナ印の木箱」を3個回収することができた。ブラックブラッシュ停留所の「ゼゼダ」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL065_00308_SEQ_03<tab>Zezeda tells you of a time when Qiqirn lived as merchants within the walls of Ul'dah, before being cast out along with all the other beastmen. With few options left to them, it seems many Qiqirn have turned to a life of crime.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL065_00308_SEQ_03<tab>ゼゼダにアマジナ印の木箱を渡すと、キキルンは昔、ウルダハ都市内にいたのだということを教えてくれた。しかし、その後キキルンはウルダハの「獣人排斥令」によって都市外に締め出され、外で盗みを働くようになってしまった、ということらしい。
TEXT_SUBWIL065_00308_TODO_01<tab>ゼゼダにアマジナ印の木箱を渡す

source: TEXT_SUBWIL065_00308_ZEZEDA_000_1<tab>You there, help me! A mischief of Qiqirn has stolen our cargo!
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL065_00308_ZEZEDA_000_1あ～あんたまだいたんだ！　良かった～！
聞いてよ、キキルンの盗人連中がまた積み荷に手を出したの！

source: TEXT_SUBWIL065_00308_ZEZEDA_000_2<tab>The thieving rats love anything that sparkles, and they've made off with several coffers of precious gemstones!
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL065_00308_ZEZEDA_000_2アイツら、キラキラした光り物が好きなせいで、
すぐ積み込み途中の鉱石を盗んでいっちゃうの。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL065_00308_ZEZEDA_000_3<tab>The overseer will flay me alive if he finds out! I beg you, help me get the gemstones back!
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL065_00308_ZEZEDA_000_3納品物が盗まれたことが上司にバレたら、
「お前の管理不足だ」って上司に怒られちゃう！

source: TEXT_SUBWIL065_00308_ZEZEDA_000_4<tab>The Qiqirn fled to their lair to the southwest. Follow the tracks and you're bound to find them.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL065_00308_ZEZEDA_000_4この先に盗賊キキルンのアジト「ネズミの巣」があるの。
「アマジナ印の木箱」が3箱、きっとそこにあるはずよ！
お願い、取り返してきて！

source: TEXT_SUBWIL065_00308_ZEZEDA_000_10<tab>You're back! Please tell me you've retrieved the gemstones!
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL065_00308_ZEZEDA_000_10待ってましたぁっ！
「アマジナ印の木箱」は取り戻せたのね！？

source: TEXT_SUBWIL065_00308_ZEZEDA_000_11<tab>Bless you thrice over, adventurer! Thanks to you, my hide will remain intact!
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL065_00308_ZEZEDA_000_11これよこれ！　よかった～！！
ありがとう、これで今回は上司に怒られずにすむわ！

source: TEXT_SUBWIL065_00308_ZEZEDA_000_12<tab>It's hard to believe that the Qiqirn used to be honest merchants. Some of them even lived in Ul'dah.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL065_00308_ZEZEDA_000_12しかし、あの盗人キキルンたちには困ったものだわ。
あれでも昔は、ウルダハの都市内でまっとうに
商売してたっていうんだから、信じられない話よね。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL065_00308_ZEZEDA_000_13<tab>But then the beastmen were banished from the city, and the Qiqirn lost their livelihood.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL065_00308_ZEZEDA_000_13まあ、ウルダハの商人たちが商売のジャマだって言って、
「獣人排斥令」を作って追い出しちゃったんだけど……。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL065_00308_ZEZEDA_000_14<tab>Some turned to thieving and other petty crimes to survive. It's a sad tale, but sadder still that most of the citizens couldn't care less.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL065_00308_ZEZEDA_000_14その結果が、鬱陶しいキキルン盗賊団の結成っていう話よ。
ウルダハの人達は良くても、外の私達にとっては迷惑な話よね！
